title: My px3 won't charge via USB. I've tried a new Google charger. Also no data transfer with a new cable
content:
Audio, data transfer, and charging no longer work today. I can see no option in USB settings(all greyed out). Tried new cabled, but no charging. Currently on 48%.
Have restarted twice, and no diiference.

This phone is a replacement for my first px3 which had the exact same problem.

What should I do now? Thanks.
